name: GPT Realtime
description: Most advanced speech-to-speech model optimized for low-latency real-time voice conversations with natural and expressive speech.
notes: Optimized for production voice agents with improvements in following complex instructions, tool calling precision, and natural speech output. Supports WebSocket streaming, function calling, and cached input tokens at $0.40/1M. 20% cheaper than gpt-4o-realtime-preview.
